name: Undergrowth (Sown)
description: The year is 2144. Deep within the bowels of the evil Biopath Industries, a wailing can be heard. The Root, the result of years of failed experiments and mistreatment, has woken up. It spreads its tendrils as humanity falls prey to the Vinerot, a disease that turns all who touch it into violent monsters! You are the last of a failing military operation, immune to the Vinerot for unknown reasons, and have finally made it into the depths of the facility. It’s time to end this blight on the world, but the hardest challenge is still to come.
